title: Need help finishing the design/layout of a wall mural for a client using InDesign/Photoshop.
snippet:
I need a Photoshop / InDesign expert to finish a wall mural project for me. The design is based on an image timeline. I have started the design/layout of the mural in InDesign and edited the images in Photoshop. I now have revisions from the client that i need someone to complete. The revisions include:
- feathering/blending/merging images rather than how they currently appear which is square/cleaned finish. You'll be able to see in the attached what i mean. 
- I also need additional photos to be added and some exiting images made smaller. The new/additional photos will need to be made black and white also.

I have attached a screen grab of the design. Once the freelancer has been approved i will supply all files including working InDesign files and images via Dropbox.
